artist: Louis Yves Quéverdo; After Raphael Sanzio
description: Holy Family under an oak tree; Virgin seated; supports Christ Child with right arm as he steps on cradle;  at left St. John the Baptist holds a scroll saying "Ecce Agnus Dei"; Virgin's left arm rests on ruin of classical frieze while St. Joseph leans on the other side; ruins beyond
marks:
Signature, Date, and Inscriptions

Below image i See Inscriptions
title: The Repose of the Holy Family
